WorkItem.Description: The iLvl 245 set pieces that require emblem of triumph and a trophy are being filtered in/out by the emblem of triumph filter rather than the armor tokens filter even though the armor tokens filter mentions "Trophy"
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Armor Tokens Filter not catching iLvl 245 gear

Comments.Message:
If you had read previous post earlier you would have seen this several times but here is the solution.
The 'Armor  Token' filterdoesn't work on these because of the Emblem of Triumph cost that goes hand in hand with the tokens.
Solution- create subfilter for 'Emblem of Triumph' filter called 'Trophy of the Crusade' and the same in the pattern; now deselect new filter and presto items are now filtered out.
